snippet.title: Galactic Civilizations III: Intrigue - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Assemble your cabinet of advisors, choose a form of government, and earn the trust and faith of your people. Politics are here on a galactic scale in Galactic Civilizations III: Intrigue!

Pre-order available here: 
http://galciv3.com/intrigue

Wishlist on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/747060


* * *

Streaming live all your favorite games and more!
